import React, { useState } from "react"; import Map from '../../shared/components/UIElements/Map'; import { Col, Image, Row, Button, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; import "./UserItem.css"; const UserItem = props => { const [showDetail, setShowDetail] = useState(false); const openDetailHandler = () => setShowDetail(true); const closeDetailHandler = () => setShowDetail(false); return ( {props.name}

{props.name}

Age : {props.age}

Score : {props.score}

    Interest : {props.interest.map(interest =>
  • {interest}
    • )}

Bio : {props.bio}

{props.genre}
); }; export default UserItem;
